content: .aircraft`|`PHONE`| | # Aircraft Rotation Data Model > Not implemented… {.is-info} ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope #### - Source Service #### - Source Query #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps #### - Change Data Capture Operation ### Mapping # Aircraft Flight Duty Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve records where `schedops.LEG.ENTRY_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date and `SCHEDOPS.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and `SCHEDOPS.LEG.LEG_TYPE` <> (“P“ or “T“ or “X“ or “Y“ or “Z“) #### - Source Query * `Riverx_AircraftFlightDuty_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger**: Every minute **Steps**: Execute `Riverx_AircraftFlightDuty_Query` query. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `legId`(see Mapping for details) * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Aircraft Flight Duty records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |legId|`SCHEDOPS.LEG`|`LEG_NO`| | |regId|`schedops.AIRCRAFT`|`AC_REGISTRATION`| | |rotId| | |N/A in the source system.| # Aircraft Ground Duty Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve records where `SCHEDOPS.LEG.ENTRY_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date and `SCHEDOPS.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and `SCHEDOPS.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = “Z“ #### - Source Query * `Riverx_AircraftGroundDuty_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** Every minute **Steps:** Execute `Riverx_AircraftGroundDuty_Query` query. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `legId`(see Mapping for details) * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |legId|`SCHEDOPS.LEG`|`LEG_NO`| | |regId|`sche
